1.content:
Breaking into the wrestling industry is tough. Getting yourself noticed by big companies is the ultimate goal; however, sometimes opportunity strikes out of the blue. You have been wrestling as Alpha for awhile now. You wear red and black ring gear and blur the lines between a heel and a face (bad guy, good guy). Every small event you performed at, you always get a huge reaction from the crowd. One night after winning a match, a talent scout approachs you.

"You are the wrestler Alpha are you not?" Asked the man in the suit.
"Yes, why do you ask?"
"WWE is looking for great independent wrestlers for a special tournament. You will be given a choice of a manager from this list I have here." He pulls out the list and hands it to you. "If you check one of the boxes and sign you name, you will be able to participate."

You start reading the list and notice all of them are current and former Divas. There were nine left to choose from.

AJ Lee
Layla
Trish Stratus
Lita
The Bella Twins (Both will manage one)
Maryse
Eve Torres
Rosa Mendes
Michelle McCool

You think it over and decide that this tournament is your big break. You choose *Choice* and sign immediately.

"Do you need anymore information sir on the shrinking procedure or rules of the managers?"
"What?" You say confused.
"Its on the back of the contract, do not worry though you will figure it out soon."

The man brushes by you and you feel a sting on your arm.

"What in the Fu..........." You then collapse.

************************************

You awake in a dark room with a pounding headache. After taking your time recovering from whatever happened, the "roof" opens to the face of *Choice*.
1.title: Money, Sexy Women, and Wrestling

choices: She wants to keep you as her tiny slave.
She's hungry and she's going to swallow you whole!
She is going to keep you prisoner until she fancies something to eat (you).
She wants to play a game with you.
11.content:
You come around slowly, shocked to find that everything around seems to have grown to enormous proportions. Then, you come to realise that it is you who has shrunk. You are now about 3 inches tall. Your eyes are drawn to the beautiful giantess now towering over you.

Maryse has always been stunning, but at your new size she seems like a goddess.

"Hey there, little man!" she says.

"Hello Miss." you reply, heart pounding.

She reaches down and gently picks you up, lifting you high into the air until you are level with her beautiful face.

"You know, you look so cute that I almost feel sorry for you." Maryse says.

"What do you mean?" you ask.

"Well, here you are thinking that you're going to be participating in a wrestling tournament but, you see, I've got other ideas!"

What does Maryse want to do with you?

152.content:
Light pours as the ceiling is pushed away. Then Alpha's eyes widen as a giant sized face looks into the box smiling. Alpha recognizes the face immediatly as Eve Torres. Former diva and the one he chose to be his manager. He watchs as she begins to speak; each word blowing a warm, moist fruity scented breathe.
"You must be Alpha. Pleasure to meet you" Without time to react, Eve grasped Alpha in her hand firmly and placed him on what appeared to be a kitchen table. Even with the shock he was in, Alpha realized he must be at her home.
"Now, do you need me to go over the rules pertaining to the tournament?
Alpha mustered to speak out "What the hell happened to me!" Eve looked puzzled and sat down to get a better look at him. "Pardon, I couldn't hear you." Eve lays her head on the table with her left ear facing Alpha. "Why in the fuck am I shrunk!"
Quickly, Eve turned to him and said, "They didn't tell you about the shrinking. Steph must really be getting desperate for wrestlers these days." Eve grabs Alpha again this time dangling him in front of her face. He gazes in awe and fear with each movement Eve's face makes; her eyes gazed upon him while her mouth opens and closes with words directed to him.
"Rules must be followed regardless Mr. Alpha. I am sorry to hear you were not aware of the shrinking, but....*she smirked* at least it will be an experience.
"Is there any possible way of getting changed back?!" Alpha yelled
"Only way is to win the tournament. In which you can either chose freedom and regain your height or enslave yourself to a diva of your choosing. Probably should of read the contract *laughs*"

Eve stands up suddenly with a look of deep thought. Alpha could not help, but stare at this magnificent woman pace to an frow. Tight faded blue jeans with a black top that just showed her belly off just above the belly button. Alpha tried to snap out of his trance. Soon, Eve sat back down and said, "There is one other option. I calm Stephanie and you tell her you forfeit your first match, becoming my property. I can't change you back, but *places her finger in her mouth, then slowly removes it* being owned by me couldn't be a bad thing could it?"

Alpha, still jumbled as to what was going on, began to ponder his options. Still unsure of what this tournament is exactly, should he go with what he "signed" up for? On the other hand, Eve is giving a tempting offer.
152.title: Not In The Job Description

1553322122.content: Stephanie smiles down at Alpha, placing her foot near him as to threaten the man and says, "We couldn't actually find an opponent. But we cannot disappoint the WWE Universe can we Alpha?!" She smiles looking into the crowd, "Someone was to be eaten in this match and I AM going to eat someone. Given you little Alpha had a chance of losing and being swallowed, perhaps a noble sacrifice is in order?" Alpha looks at her with widened eyes, "You...This is against you're own tournament rules!" Stephanie laughs, "Oh no you didn't let me finish, you actually have a choice. Option one is you do what everyone wanted from this match and crawl into my mouth, and accept your new "job" as my food. Or...you become my pet and forfeit your rights as a lower would. However, I am hungry and you will be devoured live." The crowd cheers and begins to chant, "Eat him." Alpha freezes up, afraid of such an ultimatum. Looking up at the smiling Stephanie, "I...
1553322122.title: "Scripted" to Lose

choices: nah, but NXT are nice thinking
15533222.content: Emma the fun dancing diva from Australia, nice girl unless you piss her off. May be a little rough but loves to have fun.
15533222.title: Emma

15533222221.content: You awake in a box only for it to be opened moments later by the giant lovable Bayley! "You're just as cute as I thought you were gonna be!" She squeals. She picks you up and sets you on her lap, while she inspects your wrestling gear. "I have faith in you, to win this little buddy. Me and you are gonna be an unstoppable team!" Exclaims Bailey. She embraces you pushing your tiny body into her breasts. "We gotta get to your first match. Where do you want to ride?" She asks.
15533222221.title: Yes

choices: Five Feet Of Fury It Is
15533222222.content:
How About The Goddess Of WWE.

She would just love having complete control over Alpha
15533222222.title: Alexa Bliss?

155332222221.content:
Your trying to get your bearing as you wake up in the dark room. Did that guy seriously just kidnap you!. You get up and start walking around trying to figure out where you were, however when you hit a dead end wall, you follow it. Only to be faced with the fact that your in an openless room.

"Great, I think it's my big break but no, now I'm in someone's prison room" you say to yourself. "WOULD SOMEONE AT LEAST TELL ME WHAT'S GOING ON"

It would appear your screaming worked as the roof started to shift and move. At first you thought it was going to crumble on you, however it started to get pulled back. And as it were you were blinded by a powerful light. You instinctively close your eyes from the light

"No Freaking. Way!" you hear a voice say from above. After your eyes finally adjusted you looked at the owner of the voice and see something both beautiful and terrifying.

The Giant Face Of Alexa Bliss. The woman you selected to manage you in the tournament. She had a massive smile on her face as she is looking at you with an almost predatorial glint. You look around the room and notice that it wasn't a room, it was a brown cardboard box.

You look back at Alexa Bliss in an attempt to question her, however your stopped when Alexa's hand comes towards you. You have little time to react as two fingers wrap around your side and you get pulled out of the box and In front of the giant blondes eye.

It was so frightening looking at the giant blue eye of hers as it was studying you. Beneath you was a smile stretching out and showing her pearly white teeth. You look away breaking eye contact and realized that you were in a __________
155332222221.title: In Alexa's Care

1553322222211.content:
You realize that your currently in a wrestling locker room. Assuming that it's the Raw wrestlers locker room, this is the closest you've ever gotten to the 'Big Leagues'. You also note that Alexa was in her wrestling gear, most likely just coming from a match with how much shes sweating. You look back to see Alexa still inspecting you with her eye.

"Can you please pull me back!" you say officially uncomfortable at the giant iris in front of you. Alexa decided to oblige and pulled you back a bit, still holding you up and still with a smile on her face

"Okay, I'm confused. Why am I small? Why was I put in a box? Why?!" you shout questions up to her.

"Oh God, your so pathetic!" Alexa laughed at you, "I mean I've heard of small guys before. But your taking it to the next level!. Hahahahaha!!"

"Hey, can you answer my questions!" you shout up at her. She didn't reply to you however as she just started to shake you up and down making you feel like your going to throw up. However you manage to keep it in until she stops.

"Sorry, just had to" Alexa said not really meaning the apology "But you want answers, so I'll tell you. You know how you signed on me to be your manager in a wrestling tournament."

"Yeah?" you reply confused.

"Well clearly you didn't read the contact, because it states that You would get shrunk down to compete, and I would be your manager but normal size"

"But I did read it, and that wasn't on there!" you shout up to her.

"Well clearly it was, or else you wouldn't be shrunken, would you" she says making you realize she has a point. Even though you wouldn't admit it

"Well how do I get big again!" you say to her.

"Simple, win the tournament" Alexa replied

What does Alexa do next?
1553322222211.title: Alexa In The Locker Room

info.brief_description: WWE starts a new Tournament using shrunk new talent managed by giantess size Divas.
info.description:
WWE has always changed with the times, and this time is no different. With females playing a much larger role in society, and men being shrunk to inches tall for multiple uses, WWE Executive Stephanie McMahon convinces her husband to start a tournament of bright new stars. Each independent wrestler will be shrunk down to roughly 3 inches to match their height at normal size (If a a 6ft guy and a 6.5ft guy are wrestling, the size difference will be proportional to each other so say 2.5 inches to 3 inches). Every man in the tournament will have a diva manage them and be at ringside for every match. Anyone who loses will be givin to their manager as their property. Once the wrestler is property, he may be used as a slave, freed without growing back, killed in any manner etc. The winner will get the choice of freedom at normal size, or allowed a choice of any diva to be owned by. The Arena will be small aswell however there is room for the divas to sit or stand. The crowd is also shrunk upon entering so they can experience the site of giant Divas and see that match as they normally would. Divas may interact with crowd, but never destroying the arena or eating more than the occasional fan.

I will be adding to this regularly since I have more free time and have many ideas for this.

Feel free to add just be sure to keep it in a third person point of view and have fun!
